name: api_editor_TextAsset
description: Represents a raw text or binary file asset.

properties.name: bytes
properties.description: The raw bytes of the text asset. (Read Only)

properties.name: dataSize
properties.description: The size of the text asset data in bytes. (Read Only)

properties.name: text
properties.description: The text contents of the file as a string. (Read Only)

properties.name: ToString
properties.description: Returns the contents of the TextAsset as a read-only string.

properties.name: Destroy
properties.description: Removes a GameObject, component, or asset.

properties.name: DestroyImmediate
properties.description: Destroys the specified object immediately. Use with caution and in Edit mode only.

properties.name: DontDestroyOnLoad
properties.description: Do not destroy the target Object when loading a new Scene.

properties.name: FindAnyObjectByType
properties.description: Retrieves any active loaded object of Type type.

properties.name: FindFirstObjectByType
properties.description: Retrieves the first active loaded object of Type type.

properties.name: FindObjectsByType
properties.description: Retrieves a list of all loaded objects of Type type.

properties.name: Instantiate
properties.description: Clones the object original and returns the clone.

properties.name: InstantiateAsync
properties.description: Captures a snapshot of the original object (that must be related to some GameObject) and returns the
